tool_description: Validates and formats academic references according to specified citation styles, checking for completeness and proper formatting.

references.description: List of reference entries to validate and format

target_style.description: Target citation style: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, or Vancouver

check_completeness.description: Whether to check for missing required fields

auto_correct.description: Whether to attempt automatic formatting corrections

error_messages: Empty reference list: Provide at least one reference to format.
Unsupported style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, IEEE, Vancouver].
Invalid reference format: One or more references contain unrecognizable formatting.
Too many references: Maximum 1000 references allowed per request.
usage: Provide an array of references and specify target_style. Optionally enable check_completeness and auto_correct for enhanced validation.
